description: This file defines API routes for managing 'glimpses' (short video clips) attached to music tracks, including attaching, checking, streaming, and deleting glimpses. It uses FastAPI framework, interacts with an in-memory database of tracks, and handles video file uploads and retrieval.

classes.name: GlimpseInfo
classes.description: Pydantic model representing information about a glimpse attached to a track, including track ID and whether a glimpse exists.

methods.name: _ensure_video(file: UploadFile)
methods.description: Validates that the uploaded file is a video based on its content type.

methods.name: _ensure_track(track_id: str)
methods.description: Checks if a track exists in the in-memory database for a given track ID.

methods.name: attach_glimpse(track_id: str, video: UploadFile = File(...), user: UserPublic = Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Endpoint to attach a video glimpse to a specified track after validation and permission checks.

methods.name: has_glimpse(track_id: str)
methods.description: Checks if a specified track has an attached glimpse.

methods.name: stream_glimpse(track_id: str)
methods.description: Streams the attached glimpse video file for a specified track.

methods.name: delete_glimpse(track_id: str, user: UserPublic = Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Removes the glimpse attached to a track, if the user has permission.

ctags.name: attach_glimpse
ctags.pattern: /^async def attach_glimpse(track_id: str, video: UploadFile = File(...), user: UserPublic = Depend/
ctags.signature: (track_id: str, video: UploadFile = File(...), user: UserPublic = Depends(get_current_user))

ctags.name: has_glimpse
ctags.pattern: /^    has_glimpse: bool = Field(..., description="Whether a glimpse is attached")$/

ctags.name: track_id
ctags.pattern: /^    track_id: str = Field(..., description="Associated track ID")$/
